backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for key frontend files including pages, layout, styles, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for the app’s theme.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling navigation between checkup and contact pages inside the branded layout.
frontend/src/components/BrandedLayout.ts: Layout wrapper with branded background, logo, navigation buttons, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global financial-theme Tailwind variables and utilities using green/gold palettes for UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, query client, and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact page with a WhatsApp CTA, service highlights, and a styled card layout for financial consultation outreach.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialHealthCheckU: Defines a 10‑question yes/no financial health questionnaire with scoring logic and dynamic result display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the project’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and notes for the financial health check‑up application.
